bug.author: ZoranPandovski
bug.description: Describe the bug It looks like badge.fury doesn't parse the name to lowercase and since we change PyPI name to MindsDB, it can't load the version. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7192539/57801054-2b107300-7753-11e9-8388-dfb812d39324.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: I will close this issue since it is merged on the master.
